mapper.select: select RANK() OVER(order by idx) AS rank, idx, subject, id, regdate, readhit FROM review order by rank DESC
mapper.insert: insert into review values( seq_review_idx.nextVal, #{id}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{ip}, sysdate, #{title}, #{authors}, #{thumbnail}, 0, seq_review_idx.currVal, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: update review set readhit = readhit + 1 where idx = #{idx}
update review set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, regdate=sysdate where idx=#{idx}
